sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Use this form to configure a tab to display within an instance of the Tabbed Table Widget. Configuration settings control the widget displayed within the tab, associated widget options, access restrictions, and other appearance settings.

One of the primary intents of the tabbed interface is to display various data tables, however other widgets can be displayed such as the Simple List or Approval widgets. Regardless of the widget selected, a Filters related list will be displayed to allow for configuration of various filters to control the widget. This requires the selected widget to support a filter widget option.

If the selected widget is the Data Table with Actions, then a Table Actions related list is also displayed. This enables configuration of inline actions to display in the data table list which allow end user action on the selected row.

Hover over the field names on the form for a brief description.
sys_embedded_help_content.name: Data Table Tab
